name: BFGCallbackRouter
summary: Simple URL router supporting the x-callback-url 1.0 DRAFT spec.
description: ``BFGCallbackRouter`` is an implementation of the [x-callback-url 1.0 DRAFT Spec](http://x-callback-url.com/specifications/) in Objective-C for use in iOS applications. The intention was to create a simple, light, and flexible implementation.
